typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulementwithIndex
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		ca_avoir as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		dd as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_avoir as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> avoirwithIndex
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> stgOffre
source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> referentielATC
source(output(
		{Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		prix_unitaire_std as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
RenameLeft derive(ca_final = toDouble(ca_ecoulement),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_ecc ),
		data_origin = "ecoulement",
		id_canal_final = 42) ~> caFinal
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = columnChoiceEcoulement@yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameLeft
fullLeft filter(isNull(renameAvoir@indexcols2)) ~> outerLeft
ecoulementwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoiceEcoulement
avoirwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameAvoir
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inner
inner derive(canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP", 
    iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC"))) ~> canal
canal derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45, 
    iif(canal=="FS", 51, 
    iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		ca_final = toDouble(qte_avoir)*toDouble(ca_avoir),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_avoir)) ~> idCanal
idCanal derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", 'Diffus'),
		data_origin = "ecoulement_retraité") ~> idCanalFinal
stgOffre select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre = Offre,
		{ATC Performance} = CodeATC,
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(NoOffre,
		{ATC Performance}),
	Canal = max(Canal)) ~> uniqueOffre
idCanalFinal, uniqueOffre join(renameAvoir@NoOffre == uniqueOffre@NoOffre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftOffre
Select2 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndInner
caFinal, EndInner union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", "Diffus")) ~> canalFinal
Select3 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement = qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id = marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> keepColumns
referentielATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> atcKeepingColumn
atcKeepingColumn filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> atcNotNull
atcNotNull aggregate(groupBy(code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		Marque),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> uniqueATC
keepColumns, uniqueATC join({Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& marque_name == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftATC
Select4 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumn
facturation derive(qt_cd_e = toInteger(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		qt_livr_e = toInteger(qt_livr_e),
		qt_factur_e = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		ca_livr_ = toDouble(ca_livr_),
		ca_factur_ = toDouble(ca_factur_)) ~> typeCaste
typeCaste aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth),
	qt_cd_e = sum(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = sum(ca_cd_),
		qt_livr_e = sum(qt_livr_e),
		ca_livr_ = sum(ca_livr_),
		qt_factur_e = sum(qt_factur_e),
		ca_factur_ = sum(ca_factur_),
		{Canal distribution} = first({Canal distribution}),
		{Org commerciale} = first({Org commerciale}),
		{recept de march} = first({recept de march})) ~> Aggregate2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		article = reference,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{Org commerciale},
		{recept de march},
		Sum_qt_cd_e = qt_cd_e,
		Sum_ca_cd_ = ca_cd_,
		Sum_qt_livr_e = qt_livr_e,
		Sum_ca_livr_ = ca_livr_,
		Sum_qt_factur_e = qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_ = ca_factur_,
		tempOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> aggFacturation
keepColumns aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		reference,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur),
	Sum_ca_ecoulement = sum(toDouble(ca_ecoulement)),
		Sum_qte_ecoulement = sum(toDouble(qte_ecoulement))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3, aggFacturation join(reference == article
	&& Aggregate3@yearmonth == aggFacturation@yearmonth
	&& Aggregate3@HubSAPid == aggFacturation@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerFacturation
fullLeftOffre select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = columnChoiceEcoulement@yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2 = columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = renameAvoir@HubSAPid,
		ca_avoir,
		POSid,
		indexcols2 = renameAvoir@indexcols2,
		canal = canal@canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		data_origin,
		{ATC Performance},
		NoOffre = renameAvoir@NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
canalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
fullLeftATC select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
DerivedColumn3, aggFacturation join(reference == article
	&& Aggregate3@HubSAPid == aggFacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Aggregate3@yearmonth == aggFacturation@yearmonth,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftFacturation
innerFacturation derive(qt_plateforme_final = toDouble(Sum_qt_factur_e) - toDouble(Sum_qte_ecoulement),
		ca_plateforme_final = Sum_ca_factur_ -  Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		data_origin = "facturation decrementé") ~> DerivedColumn1
Aggregate2 derive(tempOrigin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn2
Aggregate3 derive(tempOrigin = "ecoulement") ~> DerivedColumn3
leftFacturation filter(isNull(DerivedColumn3@tempOrigin)) ~> Filter1
Select6 derive(qt_plateforme_final = toDouble(Sum_qt_factur_e),
		ca_plateforme_final = Sum_ca_factur_,
		data_origin = "facturation",
		marque_name = iif({Org commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		id_canal_final = id_canal_final) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 select(mapColumn(
		reference = article,
		distributeur,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_code = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name,
		POSSAMidString = {recept de march},
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndunJoinedFacturation
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = Aggregate3@yearmonth,
		reference,
		HubSAPid = Aggregate3@HubSAPid,
		id_canal_final,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		tempOrigin,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		data_origin,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endInerEcouFact
EndunJoinedFacturation, endInerEcouFact union(byName: true)~> Union2
DerivedColumn6 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		distributeur,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_code,
		marque_name,
		POSSAMidString,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		data_origin,
		marque_id = marque_code,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDecrementation
renameColumn, endDecrementation union(byName: true)~> Union3
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		{Canal final},
		{ATC Performance},
		{code postal} = DerivedColumn5@{code postal},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Union3 derive(marque_id = coalesce(marque_id , marque_code),
		id_canal_final = coalesce(id_canal_final ),
		{Canal final} = coalesce({Canal final} , canal_final),
		{code postal} = coalesce(code_postal_atc , {Code postal})) ~> DerivedColumn5
aggFacturation filter(toInteger({recept de march})==16012598 && toInteger(article)==10017388 && instr(yearmonth, "2020")>0) ~> Filter2
Filter2 aggregate(sq = sum(Sum_qt_factur_e)) ~> Aggregate4
endDecrementation filter(toInteger(HubSAPid)==16012598 && toInteger(reference)==10017388 && instr(yearmonth, "2020")>0) ~> Filter3
Filter3 aggregate(sqte = sum(toDouble(qt_plateforme_final))) ~> Aggregate5
EndunJoinedFacturation filter(toInteger(HubSAPid)==16012598 && toInteger(reference)==10017388 && instr(yearmonth, "2020")>0) ~> Filter4
Union2 derive(id_canal_final = toInteger(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn6
Filter4 aggregate(column1 = sum( qt_plateforme_final )) ~> Aggregate6
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		distributeur,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		tempOrigin = DerivedColumn3@tempOrigin,
		article,
		HubSAPid = aggFacturation@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = aggFacturation@yearmonth,
		id_canal_final,
		{Org commerciale},
		{recept de march},
		Sum_qt_cd_e,
		Sum_ca_cd_,
		Sum_qt_livr_e,
		Sum_ca_livr_,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
endInerEcouFact filter(toInteger(HubSAPid)==16012598 && toInteger(reference)==10017388 && instr(yearmonth, "2020")>0) ~> Filter5
Filter5 aggregate(cons = sum(qt_plateforme_final)) ~> Aggregate7
Select5 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['OModelDSC.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(

		year = split(split(fileName, "_")[1], " ")[2]) ~> getMonthYear
getMonthYear select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		month_name,
		year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> KeepImportantColumn
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}!=0) ~> notNullQuantity
KeepImportantColumn derive({Quantité en UV BL} = toDouble({Quantité en UV BL}),
		{Marque Code} = toDouble({Marque Code})) ~> columnFormat
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})>0) ~> pieceDetache
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}==0) ~> nullQuantity
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})==0) ~> notPieceDetache
notPieceDetache derive(month = iif(month_name=="janv", "01", 
    iif(month_name=="févr","02",
    iif(month_name=="mars", "03", 
    iif(month_name=="avr", "04", 
    iif(month_name=="mai", "05", 
    iif(month_name=="juin", "06", 
    iif(month_name=="juil", "07", 
    iif(month_name=="août", "08", 
    iif(month_name=="sept", "09", 
    iif(month_name=="oct", "10", 
    iif(month_name=="nov", "11", 
    iif(month_name=="déc", "12", "0"))))))))))))) ~> monthToNumber
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
Aggregate1 filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoinWithOrga
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftJoin
fullLeftJoin filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> leftOuter
ventesDirectes derive({Org. commerciale} = replace({Org. commerciale}, " ", ""),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble({Qté facturée}),
		yearmonth = replace(yearmonth, " ", ""),
		Article = replace(Article, " ", "")) ~> Cleansing
Cleansing aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> SumQuantity
SumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article_right = Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté vente directe} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Référence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerVentesDirecte
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Référence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftVentesDirectes
InnerVentesDirecte derive({Quantité en UV BL} = {Quantité en UV BL}-{Qté vente directe}) ~> removeQuantityVenteDirecte
removeQuantityVenteDirecte select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},

		HubSAPid,
		BrandID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
fullLeftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth_right) || isNull(Article_right) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerLeft
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},

		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Marque DESC},
		sous_famille = {Sous Famille},
		reference = {Référence Article Fournisseur},
		agence_code = {Agence Code},

organisation aggregate(groupBy(POSid),

		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,

		{Cout standard facturé} as string,

		yearmonth as string,

		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,

		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
ecoulement filter(!isNull({Quantité})) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull derive({Quantité} = toDouble({Quantité})) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dépot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble({Qté facturée}),
		yearmonth = trim(yearmonth, " "),
		Article = trim(Article, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> sumQuantity
DerivedColumn1, typeCaste join(DerivedColumn1@Yearmonth == typeCaste@yearmonth
	&& {Référence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
Rename derive(yearmonth = toString(yearmonth),
		Article = toString(Article),
		{Code client} = toString({Code client})) ~> typeCaste
DerivedColumn1, typeCaste join(DerivedColumn1@Yearmonth == typeCaste@yearmonth
	&& {Référence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive({Quantité} = {Quantité}-{Qté ventes directes}) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
sumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(marque_file = iif(toInteger(BrandID)==1604, "saunier", "vaillant"),
		{Société} = upper({Société})) ~> marqueFile
marqueFile select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {Société},
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité},
		ca_ecoulement = Valeur,
		{Code postal} = {CP Dépôt},
		year = Year,
		month = Month,
		yearmonth = Union1@Yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		marque_file
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
innerOrganisation derive(Yearmonth = replace(Yearmonth, " ", "")) ~> DerivedColumn1

	),

getYearmonth derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="février","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="août", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="décembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber
yearmonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
monthToNumber filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Coopérative})) ~> cooperativenotNull
organisation filter(!isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> orgaCooperativeNotNull
orgaCooperativeNotNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid),
	POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid)) ~> unique
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> leftOuter

	&& REFFOURNISSEUR == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month,
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt� vente directe})) ~> enleverVentesDirectes

	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(ventesDirectes@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes

outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(

typeCaste select(mapColumn(

newColumn select(mapColumn(

	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter = iif( ( instr({Type de facture},"YFAR")==0 && instr({Motif commande},"FAS")==0 ) || ( instr({Type de facture},"YFAB")==0 && instr({Motif commande},"FAS")==0 ), 1, 0)) ~> factureFilter
factureFilter, plateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
Select3 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> newID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
newID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
changementDePeriodeFiltre derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
facturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
factureFilter, plateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	{Qté facturée} = mean({Qté facturée})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 derive(join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(DerivedColumn1@join == DerivedColumn2@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire = {Qté facturée},
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select6 derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
Select7, addperiod union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentielPrix.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput

Select1 derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 5),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 6 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
yearAndMonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement derive({Représentant} = toString(byName('Représentant')),
		{N° Département} = toString(byName('N° Département')),
		{Département} = toString(byName('Département')),
		{Libellé point de vente} = toString(byName('Libellé point de vente')),
		{N° Siret} = toString(byName('N° Siret')),
		{Année livraison} = toString(byName('Année livraison')),
		{Réference} = toString(byName('Réference')),
		{Qte en unité de vente} = toString(byName('Qte en unité de vente'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code client},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net},
		fileName,
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{N° Siret},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qte en unité de vente}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble({Qté facturée}),
		yearmonth = trim(yearmonth, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-{Qté ventes directes}) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		departement_id = {N° Département},
		reference = {Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1

		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn

		{Org. commerciale} as string,

		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,

		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PLATEFORMES
facturationbw derive(date_id = replace({Jour calendaire},'-','')) ~> transfoDate
transfoDate derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthh
extractYearMonthh derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc
FactFilterc derive(qt_cd_e = {Qté cdée},
		ca_cd_ = {CA cdé},
		qt_livr_e = {Qté livrée},
		ca_livr_ = {CA livré},
		qt_factur_e = {Qté facturée},
		ca_factur_ = {CA facturé},
		cout_standard_cd_ = {Cout standard cdé},
		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},
		cout_standard_livr_ = {Cout standard livré},
		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 && !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')> 0  ||instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')> 0) ~> filtreDSC
Select1, filtreDSC join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joindre1
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')== 0  &&  instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')== 0) ~> filtreOtherPlateforme
Select1, filtreOtherPlateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOuter
FactFilter select(mapColumn(
		{ Org. commerciale} = {Org. commerciale},
